snippet.title: [Official] Toy Tanks Trailer - A Physics Based Twin-stick shooter!
snippet.description:
Toy Tanks is a 3D Isometric, physics based action game that features a unique blend of positional platforming, fast-paced movement abilities, and twin-stick shooting. The game's focus is heavily set onto it's Campaign experience, of which can be played with up to four players. The Campaign currently features 30 Hand-Crafted levels, each featuring a careful combination of Enemy Tanks, Hazards, and Terrain layouts; created to incentivize on-the-fly creative problem solving and before-the-level tactical planning.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1345440/Toy_Tanks/

Download and Play the Free Demo: https://rodney-luck.itch.io/toy-tanks

Join the discord: https://discord.gg/Hhz32tNY
